{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6479Gn |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/24/2013 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=True |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9564791214 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197D |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=edimax.setup |default_ssid_regex=^edimax.setup$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''N300 Wireless Gigabit Router''
"1244-010000892-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This is the same board P/N as the [[Edimax BR-6478AC]].
The power adapter specified as used in the FCC test report is a '''DVE''' DSA-12PFA-05 FUS 050200 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 5VDC 2A).
